body.p:
Louisville Ky
August 15th 1862
Jno. W. Finnell

There is immediate necessity for all the troops I can get -- I prefer them without draft and for three years -- Hobson can raise one regiment in ten days at Bowling Green, is the regiment at Glasgow three years infantry, I tell you it is no time for Legislatures to consider petition for such a man as Genl Desha -- I know of what I speak let such such matters ustand, look to the salvation of the state from desolation & ruin
